content:
Hoo boy, it's time for brainstorming 2020 goals. We get it easy this time - we can just refurbish 2019 goals :joy:
https://paper.dropbox.com/doc/Rust-2020-Roadmap-Brainstorming--AlK4FcLTFsrS_yUb8OS9ZlMCAg-4avmt0xchsAtMSIuos0Pp - here's the document.

I still intend to make good progress this year on eliminating unsafe and also on clippy lints about safety, all via safety-dance. It's basically ready to go, I just need to get myself together for a week, add some minor docs to it and start actually promoting it
